Exodus__01.1: These are the names of the children of Israel, that went into Egypt with Jacob: they went in, every man with his household:
Exodus__01.4: Dan, and Nephtali, Gad and Aser.
Exodus__01.5: And all the souls that came out of Jacob's thigh, were seventy: but Joseph was in Egypt.
Exodus__01.6: After he was dead, and all his brethren, and all that generation,
Exodus__01.7: The children of Israel increased, and sprung up into multitudes, and growing exceedingly strong they filled the land.
Exodus__01.8: In the mean time there arose a new king over Egypt, that knew not Joseph:
Exodus__01.9: And he said to his people: Behold the people of the children of Israel are numerous and stronger than we.
Exodus__01.10: Come, let us wisely oppress them, lest they multiply: and if any war shall rise against us, join with our enemies, and having overcome us, depart out of the land.
Exodus__01.11: Therefore he set over them masters of the works, to afflict them with burdens, and they built for Pharao cities <u>of tabernacles</u>, Phithom and Ramesses.
Exodus__01.12: But the more they oppressed them, the more they were multiplied, and increased:
Exodus__01.13: And the Egyptians hated the children of Israel, and afflicted them and mocked them:
Exodus__01.14: And they made their life bitter with hard works in clay, and brick, and with all manner of service, wherewith they were overcharged in the works of the earth.
Exodus__01.15: And the king of Egypt spoke to the midwives of the Hebrews: of whom one was called Sephora, the other Phua,
Exodus__01.16: Commanding them: When you shall do the office of midwives to the Hebrew women, and the time of delivery is come: if it be a man child, kill it: if a woman, keep it alive.
Exodus__01.17: But the midwives feared God, and did not do as the king of Egypt had commanded, but saved the men children.
Exodus__01.18: And the king called for them and said: What is that you meant to do, that you would save the men children?
Exodus__01.19: They answered: The Hebrew women are not as the Egyptian women: for they themselves are skillful in the office of a midwife; and they are delivered before we come to them.
Exodus__01.20: Therefore God dealt well with the midwives: and the people multiplied and grew exceedingly strong.
Exodus__01.21: And <u>because the midwives feared God</u>, he built them houses.
Exodus__01.22: Pharao therefore charged all his people, saying: Whatsoever shall be born of the male sex, ye shall cast into the river: whatsoever of the female, ye shall save alive.
